message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate the willingness to compromise, but $14,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
